characters: A male on a motorcycle wearing dark clothing, a silver car in the distance
summary: The vehicle is driving on a city street. From 0.0s to 8.0s, a male on a motorcycle wearing dark clothing is seen driving in the opposite direction. At 8.0s, the motorcycle begins to turn left into the path of the self-driving vehicle. At 9.0s, the motorcycle is directly in front of the self-driving vehicle. At 10.0s, the motorcycle has crashed and the male is lying on the ground.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is driving straight on a city street. The vehicle maintains its speed until 8.0s, when the motorcycle begins to turn left. The vehicle then begins to decelerate to avoid a collision. The vehicle is unable to avoid the collision and crashes into the motorcycle.
key_objects: 1) Front: A male on a motorcycle wearing dark clothing, approximately 10 meters away, turning left into the path of the self-driving vehicle.
